title: ‘WeCrashed’ Episode 7
description:
Joanna Robinson and Mallory Rubin applaud the powerhouse performances from Anne Hathaway and Jared Leto and wonder what kind of message the show is trying to convey. Plus, they share what they hope lies ahead in the series finale and discuss how Apple TV+ stacks up against its competitors.
Hosts: Joanna Robinson and Mallory Rubin
Associate Producer: Mike Wargon
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
